pages.text: $(li)The Executioner is a very strong bloodthristy Illager who will not hesitate to decapitate the heads of the $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) or yours with its great sword.$(br)$(li)It only can be found in a $(l:patchouli:illagers/raid)Raid$(/l).$(br)$(li)Oh Death, rarely it drops its great weapon, the $(l:patchouli:weapons/cleaver_of_beheading)Cleaver of Beheading$(/l).
